page.title: 13GAMES CHILDREN PLAY 2
page.content:
NOVEMBER :{A MILL WHEEL,PUSS IN FOUR {CORNERS,POSTMAN'S KNOCK DECEMBER :{TONGUE TWISTERS
CHILDREN USED TO PLAY GAMES IN THE STREETS, BUT TODAY THEY ARE MORE INTERESTED IN TECHNOLOGICAL ACTIVITIES AND FEEL HAPPIER IN FRONT OF A COMPUTER OR VIDEO SCREEN. WE FEEL THAT THE CHILDREN ARE ALSO AFFECTED BY MODERN SOCIETY IN SUCH WAYS AS; HEAVY TRAFFIC CAUSING BUSY ROADS, HOME ENTERTAINMENTS SUCH AS VIDEO GAMES AND FILMS; FEAR OF STRANGERS;PROBLEMS OF OLDER CHILDREN SPOILING GAMES; LARGE NUMBERS OF PARENTS WITH CARS WHO TAKE THEIR CHILDREN OUT.
